data.message: hi facebook, I have a question how can I deleted facebook when your relative pass away?

replies.message: Our sincerest condolences for your loss, Darrel. When someone has passed away, it's our policy to memorialize their account. Memorialized accounts are a place for friends and family to share memories after a person has passed away and memorializing an account also helps keep it secure by preventing anyone from logging into it. You can learn more about memorialized accounts here: on.fb.me/1x3ORPz. Please let us know if you have any questions. -Rhea
Actually facebook can help you to return your relatives so don't delete the account
